references: In this section, the considered system model is presented. We introduce the basic concepts and procedure of FL in Section II-A. The definitions of DP and MSE-security used to measure the privacy leakage and security level of the system are introduced in Section II-B and Section II-C, respectively. Typical notations used in this paper are summarized in Table I.

S2.T2.caption: TABLE II: Loss functions for popular machine learning models
references: where l​(𝒎;(𝒖,v))𝑙𝒎𝒖𝑣l\left(\bm{m};\left(\bm{u},v\right)\right) is an empirical loss function defined by learning task, quantifying the loss of 𝒎𝒎\bm{m} at sample (𝒖,v)𝒖𝑣\left(\bm{u},v\right). Some typical loss functions l​(𝒎;(𝒖,v))𝑙𝒎𝒖𝑣l\left(\bm{m};\left(\bm{u},v\right)\right) applied in ML are listed in Table II.
